TITLE: Reset Password
LOGIN_MESSAGE: You can now log in with your new password.
FAILED_RESET: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
TOKEN_ERROR: An error occurred while validating the reset token.
PASSWORD_CHANGE_EMAIL_SENT_MESSAGE: We have sent you an email with instructions to change your password. Please check your inbox.
CHECK_EMAIL_INSTRUCTIONS: Please check your email inbox and spam folder for the password reset instructions.
LOGGED_OUT: You have been logged out for security. Please log in again with your new password.
PASSWORD_RESET_SENT: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email
WILL_BE_LOGGED_OUT: You will be logged out when you close this dialog for security
PLEASE_CHECK_EMAIL: Please check your email inbox and spam folder for the password reset link
